ValidationRule.description: RevenueStart Date must be within a normal range
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Closed Won")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Cancelled")),
OR(
Revenue_Start_Date__c <= TODAY(), Revenue_Start_Date__c <= DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), Revenue_Start_Date__c > ADDMONTHS(TODAY(), 15)
), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.Users_Exclusion,$User.Username)), RecordTypeId == $CustomMetadata.Constant__mdt.FinleapConnectStandardSales_RecordTypeId.value__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Revenue Start Date Cannot be less than today or more than 15months in future.
